node.title: ASI Members In Action
node.description: ASI Members share how they are using their God-given talents to witness to others. Come and listen to professionals and business members who have committed their lives to the Master and who are using their jobs, businesses, hobbies, vacations, and travel opportunities to reach those who come their way. Get ready to be inspired as your heart is touched. Gain a vision for what Christ can accomplish in and through you!
